004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.simulation;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.hal.SimDouble;
008import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.ADIS16448_IMU;
009
010/** Class to control a simulated ADIS16448 gyroscope. */
011@SuppressWarnings({"TypeName", "AbbreviationAsWordInName"})
012public class ADIS16448_IMUSim {
013  private final SimDouble m_simGyroAngleX;
014  private final SimDouble m_simGyroAngleY;
015  private final SimDouble m_simGyroAngleZ;
016  private final SimDouble m_simAccelX;
017  private final SimDouble m_simAccelY;
018  private final SimDouble m_simAccelZ;
019
020  /**
021   * Constructs from an ADIS16448_IMU object.
022   *
023   * @param gyro ADIS16448_IMU to simulate
024   */
025  public ADIS16448_IMUSim(ADIS16448_IMU gyro) {
026    SimDeviceSim wrappedSimDevice = new SimDeviceSim("Gyro:ADIS16448" + "[" + gyro.getPort() + "]");
027    m_simGyroAngleX = wrappedSimDevice.getDouble("gyro_angle_x");
028    m_simGyroAngleY = wrappedSimDevice.getDouble("gyro_angle_y");
029    m_simGyroAngleZ = wrappedSimDevice.getDouble("gyro_angle_z");
030    m_simAccelX = wrappedSimDevice.getDouble("accel_x");
031    m_simAccelY = wrappedSimDevice.getDouble("accel_y");
032    m_simAccelZ = wrappedSimDevice.getDouble("accel_z");
033  }
034
035  /**
036   * Sets the X axis angle in degrees (CCW positive).
037   *
038   * @param angleDegrees The angle.
039   */
040  public void setGyroAngleX(double angleDegrees) {
041    m_simGyroAngleX.set(angleDegrees);
042  }
043
044  /**
045   * Sets the Y axis angle in degrees (CCW positive).
046   *
047   * @param angleDegrees The angle.
048   */
049  public void setGyroAngleY(double angleDegrees) {
050    m_simGyroAngleY.set(angleDegrees);
051  }
052
053  /**
054   * Sets the Z axis angle in degrees (CCW positive).
055   *
056   * @param angleDegrees The angle.
057   */
058  public void setGyroAngleZ(double angleDegrees) {
059    m_simGyroAngleZ.set(angleDegrees);
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Sets the X axis acceleration in meters per second squared.
064   *
065   * @param accelMetersPerSecondSquared The acceleration.
066   */
067  public void setAccelX(double accelMetersPerSecondSquared) {
068    m_simAccelX.set(accelMetersPerSecondSquared);
069  }
070
071  /**
072   * Sets the Y axis acceleration in meters per second squared.
073   *
074   * @param accelMetersPerSecondSquared The acceleration.
075   */
076  public void setAccelY(double accelMetersPerSecondSquared) {
077    m_simAccelY.set(accelMetersPerSecondSquared);
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Sets the Z axis acceleration in meters per second squared.
082   *
083   * @param accelMetersPerSecondSquared The acceleration.
084   */
085  public void setAccelZ(double accelMetersPerSecondSquared) {
086    m_simAccelZ.set(accelMetersPerSecondSquared);
087  }
088}
